title: Nan Huai-Chin - Buddhism and Zen Collection 2016.03
description:
A collection of e-books by the lay Buddhist meditation master Nan Huai-Chin. The subjects are on Zen, Buddhism, Daoism, and especially meditation. Master Nan is known for having more advanced books on these subjects than other authors, which is why these books are prized by long-time students of meditation and spiritual cultivation.

- Tao & Longevity (1984)
- Grass Mountain (1986)
- Working Toward Enlightenment (1993)
- To Realize Enlightenment (1994)
- The Story of Chinese Zen (1995)
- Basic Buddhism (1997)
- The Story of Chinese Taoism (2002)
- Diamond Sutra Explained (2004)
- Nan Huai-Chin and Peter Senge (2008)
- The Mind Experiment (2012)

His classic works that were previously unavailable have been scanned at very high quality 600 ppi, and bound into PDF documents.

If you are interested in Zen, Buddhism, Daoism, or meditation in general, please download these books and seed them so others can also have a chance to obtain these valuable teachings
